name: Worms (itch)
description:
Worms - for Construct 2

DEMO http://worms4.bitballoon.com/

Description: Turn-based tactical game based on the game of Worms, where you can fight with another player.

The kit includes:

-Capx. file

-HTML5 export

-Behaviors

-Plugins Control: Mouse and Touch Control

Events: 447
